Nielsen’s Consumer 360 is a global events series that brings you innovative thought leaders and industry experts who share exclusive insights to help you develop business solutions fueled with punch and ingenuity. Learn to drive successful outcomes from well-respected trailblazers who will share their cutting edge strategies and results. Explore uncommon ideas across the consumer spectrum to help you harness the power of people today and then delve into industry-specific discussions focused on your needs.

MobCast is the EASIEST and the MOST EFFECTIVE way to broadcast rich content on mobile devices.


Enterprises and other entities can leverage this patent pending technology to communicate and build lasting relationship with their customers , employees and other stakeholders.

The platform smartly identifies and distinguishes smartphones from feature phones and correspondingly publishes the communication with the application or as an SMS.

Built by a team of award winning mobile experts, its notably the only platform of its kind and starts a new and revolutionary chapter in the field of group communication.

HDFC Bank wins Best Private Banking Services for Super affluent clients for 5 years in a row at Euromoney Awards

HDFC Bank has once again been recognized for excellence in India in the 2015 Euromoney Private Banking and Wealth Management Survey. HDFC Bank was adjudged as having the Best Private Banking Services in India for a fifth consecutive year in the Net-worth-specific services category for Super affluent clients (US$ 1 million to US$ 5 million). HDFC Bank also ranked first in the Asset Management category of the survey.
HDFC Bank launches rural Financial Literacy Initiative in Sawantwadi

HDFC Bank Ltd today launched its rural Financial Literacy Initiative in Sawantwadi in the Sindhudhurg district of Maharashtra, under the aegis of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI). This initiative complements HDFC Bank’s efforts to support inclusive growth and take formal banking services to the remote corners of India. The Financial Literacy programme in Sawantwadi is the first of a series of such camps that HDFC Bank plans to hold. The bank will roll out financial literacy camps in 4 branches in the Sindhudhurg district, reaching out to just over 85 villages in the region. The camps will enable both adults and school children to attain a conceptual understanding of financial products and services.
Nielsen Picks A Pack Of ‘Preferred Platform Partners,’ Pushes Toward ‘Total Audience’ (AdExchanger)

Nielsen has a new program designed to give advertisers and agencies a clearer lens into the digital audience activation process, the company announced Wednesday at its Consumer 360 conference in Washington, DC. The inaugural set of “Preferred Platform Partners” includes BrightRoll, DoubleClick, FreeWheel, Moat, RocketFuel, TubeMogul, Tremor Video, Viant and Videology. Other ad tech platforms can apply, but must meet certain requirements for tagging, reporting and server connections.
Aditya Puri Of HDFC Bank Says Growth Will Pick Up This Fiscal

HDFC Bank named Best Bank (New Private Sector) at FE Awards

HDFC Bank bagged three awards at the FE Best Bank Awards for the year 2012-13. Our Bank was adjudged the Best Bank in the New Private sector category and also named winner in the Efficiency category as well as the Profitability category. HDFC Bank won the highest number of awards in the various categories this year.We are more optimistic now than ever before about the future,” said our MD Mr.AdityaPuri, on receiving news of the announcement.The newspaper held a ceremony to present these awards on January 30, 2015 in Mumbai at The Taj Hotel. On behalf of the bank, our Deputy Managing Director, Mr.PareshSukthankar received the award for Best Bank in the New Private Sector Category.

BY: TECHNOLOGY TEAM - A YEAR AGO
BY: HR TEAM - A YEAR AGO
NIELSEN LEAVES ITS MARK AT THE 2015 CANNES LIONS FESTIVAL

Amidst a sea of the world’s brightest creatives, marketers, technologists and media specialists at this year’s Cannes Lions Festival (June 21-27), we left our mark as Campaigners of Creativity—this year’s theme. We shared insights and innovative thought leadership to drive change in the media and technology industries. And for the first year, we became an official sponsor, which helped us make an even bigger splash on this global stage. Julanne Schiffer from Nielsen Entertainment was a featured speaker on the topic of “Unlocking the Power of Music in Advertising.” With more than 150 delegates in attendance, her presentation focused on understanding the impact of music to help drive growth for brands.
Nielsen, the TV Industry’s Favorite Scapegoat, Is Fighting Back (CMO Today - WSJ)

A favorite gripe among media executives is that Nielsen has failed to keep up with tectonic shifts in how viewers watch television. Now the ratings measurement giant is striking back at those critics. “Sometimes they are using us as a scapegoat,” Nielsen Chief Executive Mitch Barns said in an interview. “When ratings are down, you’d hate it to be because your programming maybe fell a little bit behind. You’d much rather have it be because maybe somebody isn’t doing everything that you think they ought to do.”
